verbs.description: sojourney (third-person singular simple present sojourneys, present participle sojourneying, simple past and past participle sojourneyed)

entries.meaning: (obsolete) To sojourn; to reside during one's travels.
examples: As Abraham was not his subject he could not command him; but as Abraham had sojourneyed in his land, and he was acquainted with the power of Abraham, i. e. God's protection: he was desirous of Abraham's oath,  [â€¦]
